mapper.select: SELECT uinfo.author_id, uinfo.avatar_path, uinfo.nick_name, SUM( DISTINCT binfo.pageviews ) beenViews, COUNT( DISTINCT ar1.article_id ) original, ROUND( DATEDIFF( CURDATE( ), uinfo.create_time ) / 30 ) settled, uinfo.personal_profile, uinfo.school, uinfo.company_name FROM article ar1, article ar2, blog_info binfo, user_info uinfo WHERE ar1.attributes = 0 AND uinfo.author_id = ar1.author_id AND binfo.article_id = ar2.article_id AND ar2.author_id = uinfo.author_id AND uinfo.author_id = #{authorId}
